mapper.select: SELECT station_id, bus_id, commute_id, line, main_place, detail_place, departure_time, office_place, office_time, latitue, longitude FROM nosun WHERE office_place != '' AND commute_id = 0
SELECT bus_id, station_id, main_place, detail_place, departure_time, latitue, longitude FROM nosun WHERE bus_id = #{busId} ORDER BY station_id

SELECT a.reserve_date as date, IFNULL(a.remain_seat-b.count_reserve, a.remain_seat) as remain_seats_count FROM ( SELECT temp_date as reserve_date, 44 as remain_seat FROM ( SELECT @rnum:=@rnum+1 as rownum, date(adddate('2022-01-01', interval @rnum day)) as temp_date FROM ( SELECT @rnum:=-1 ) r, dummydatenum ) k WHERE temp_date between '2022-12-01' and '2022-12-31') a left join ( SELECT reserve_date, count(reserve_date) as count_reserve FROM reservation WHERE bus_id=1 GROUP BY reserve_date) b on a.reserve_date = b.reserve_date
